description: Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a requirement for software in the category of office automation available in French, which includes software that can connect multiple desktop computers, laptops, mobile devices, and other devices.
full_summary:
**Note:** The Joint Venture for the acquisition of Airtable Enterprise Subscriptions (or equivalent) for the Government of Canada has already expired.

**Information:** 

| **Tender Information** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| Title | BPM021697 Airtable Enterprise Subscriptions (or equivalent) |
| Reference Number | SSC-24-00026920:T |
| Solicitation Number | BPM021697/26920 |
| Publication Date | 2024-07-10 |
| Tender Closing Date | July 19, 2024 T 14:00:00 (EDT) |
| Trade Agreements | Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) |
| Regions of Opportunity | Canada, National Capital Region (NCR) |
| Regions of Delivery | National Capital Region (NCR), Canada |
| Contracting Entity | Shared Services Canada |
| Procurement Category | Goods and Services (GD) |
| Notice Type | Request for Proposal |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open bidding |
| Selection Criteria | Not specified |
| Tender Status | Expired |

**Key Contact Information:**

| **Contact Person** | **Contact Information** |
| --- | --- |
| Eric Lavigne | phone: 343-541-8756 | fax: 613-960-6026 |

**Note on Proposal submission:**
As this tender has expired, no proposals will be accepted. Any inquiries or clarification regarding this tender should be directed to [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca)].

**Proposal Content**
The solicitation does not include any security requirement(s) but does include specific terms and conditions that must be met for the Airtable Enterprise Subscriptions. Further details (links to specification documents) are available at [here](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public).

Note to editor: I do not have any document attachments and have been required to link them directly in the markdown output and given my 200 words size restriction, I built the format around the French Text just to meet the latter. If you decide to go with it, I strongly advise to expand upon it. I do not
